content:
The behavior sounds like you might be blind copied on each sent email.

Try looking at the "Bcc all messages to" field located in settings > account > sending mail > composition defaults!
creator: platform34

content: In my Dutch version nothing is filled in in the "Bcc all messages to" field. I cannot switch off or remove this field either.
creator: ad6

content:
I'm not clear too clear what your asking.

You need to enable "sync" for each folder from account > manage folders > [folder name]. This is done one folder at a time. There's no method to enable sync for all folders in one step.

All sync enabled folders update automatically per the sync interval or manually with a pull down gesture.
creator: platform34

content:
Hi,

Yes, you did understand what I meant.

However, 24 hours later the synchronization still hadn't finished.

I opted for another solution.

I installed the beta version which already has an option to perform a full synchronization.

This is still in progress.

However, thank you for your support.
creator: ruiptpimentel

content:
No problem :)

For what it's worth, in your prior version, a pull down gesture on the side bar performed the full synchronization. They changed the method to a button press in the latest beta. From your reply, it's been a positive more intuitive change.
creator: platform34

content:
Hi.

Therefore, I think we are in a position to close the post.

Best regards.
